content:
Wachter family

1 Feiwel WACHTER                     1775-76 - 1849 #261 (Majer+Jentli)
 + Bayli                             1774 (Moses)
  2x Samuel WACHTER                  Feb 18, 1807 Krakow - Nov 25, 1875 #327
    + Ester LOBZOWER                 1812 - Feb 21, 1871 #55
          married 1831 #13
     3x Jozef Mendel WACHTER         1835 #424
   ??  + Rywka KORNREICH
   ??   4o Beile WACHTER             Feb 8, 1859 #1770
   ??   4x Gerson WACHTER            Apr 9, 1865 #288
     3x Abraham Chaim WACHTER        Jul 20, 1837 #371
     3x son WACHTER                  - 1839 #265
     3x Aron Izaak WACHTER           1841 #164 - 1841 #164
     3o Marya WACHTER                1843 #86 - 1843 #55
     3o Jacheta WACHTER              Oct 27, 1844 (1845 #246)
       * Nathan SCHRAM               1846 Dombrow
        4o Regina SCHRAM             Dec 5, 1871 Dabrowa
        4o Ernestine SCHRAM          May 8, 1873
        4o Rozia SCHRAM              Aug 15, 1875
        4o Jaga SCHRAM               May 16, 1878
        4o daughter SCHRAM           Jan 3, 1881 #57 - Jan 6, 1881 #11
        4o daughter SCHRAM           Jan 24, 1882 #107 - Jan 24, 1882 #25
        4o Hinda SCHRAM              Jun 3, 1883 #306
        4x Abraham Samuel SCHRAM     Apr 22, 1886 #220
        4x Mojzesz SCHRAM            Aug 31, 1889 #539
  2o Feigel NACHTWACHTER             1811 #124b
 + Chaja STECHER                     c1791 - 1836 #396
 + Chaia Perla FROST                 Apr 27, 1809 Krakow - after 1880
       banns Aug 20, 1838 #43
  2x Mojzesz Jozef WACHTER           Sep 17, 1839 #449 - ?Mar 1, 1911




     Majer WACHTER
    + Sara Feigel                    - 1838 #217 (Michal)
     3x Elias WACHTER                - 1833 #117
     3x Kida WACHTER                 1835 #96 - 1836 #4
